full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Project Title
Services for DART components on Bell type helicopters: repair, overhaul, and exchange.

## Reference Number
cb-7234-37129046

## Background
Transport Canada's Aircraft Service Directorate (ASD) is seeking a contractor to provide repair and overhaul services for DART components installed on Bell type helicopters (429, 412, 407) operated by Transport Canada. The subsequent contract will have a minimum period of 24 months.

## Tender Description
Bidders must demonstrate their ability to perform the following services:

* Repair
* Overhaul
* Modification
* Advanced exchange
* Testing
* Recertification

The contractor will work on an "as and when requested" basis using Task Authorizations (TAs). The contractor must be an approved Repair and Overhaul Facility for DART Aerospace components for Bell type helicopters operated by Transport Canada.

## Tender Evaluation Criteria
* Compliance with the bid solicitation
* Possession of an approved Repair and Overhaul Facility for DART Aerospace components
* Approval as a Transportation Canada Approved Maintenance Organization (AMO) or FAA Approved Repair Station

## Trade Agreement Considerations
This Request for Proposal (RFP) respects the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-GPA) prescriptions.

## Tendering Details
* Tender closing date: 2023-09-01T14:00:00
* Amendment date: 2023-09-01
* Tender status: Expired
* Regions of opportunity: Canada
* Regions of delivery: Canada
